components.hint: The sun (日) component began to be omitted for brevity during the Warring States period.

images.description: 鄂君啟舟節(金)戰國中期
鄂君啟車節(金)戰國中期
熹.春秋.僖廿一年(隸)東漢

shuowen: 《說文》：“夏，中國之人也。从夊、从頁、从。，兩手；夊，兩足也。，古文（夏）。”
hint: Pictograph of a person, represented by their head (頁) and feet (夂), being heated underneath the sun (日). The sun component was later omitted for brevity during the Warring States period.

chars.shuowen: 《說文》：“夂，从後至也。象人兩脛後有致之者。讀若黹。”
chars.hint: 夂 is a component form of 止, which is a pictograph of a foot.

topWords.gloss: see also 冬字頭|冬字头[dōng​zì​tóu]

chars.shuowen: 《說文》：“日，實也，太陽之精不虧。从囗、一，象形。日說文古文，古文，象形。”

chars.hint: Pictograph of a head (首) on top of a person (卩). Means "head" when pronounced xié. Has unrelated meaning "leaf" when pronounced yè, due to this character being adopted as a variant form of 葉.
chars.shuowen: 《說文》：“頁，頭也。从，从儿。古文如此。者首字也。”

comments.text: 李孝定《甲骨文字集釋》：“古文頁𦣻首當為一字，頁象頭及身，𦣻但象頭，首象頭及其上髮小異耳。”按：清嚴可均等認為“𦣻者䭫首字也”六字是後人所贅入的校語。

definitions: see also 冬字頭|冬字头[dōng​zì​tóu]

definitions: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC
